PublicRemarks: Location, Location, Location! Welcome to this beautifully renovated  2-bedroom, 1.5-bath colonial townhouse in the highly sought-after Oxford Row community, This unit  is one of the most updated ones in the community. Ideally located on the edge of Fairfax City. This move-in ready home has been freshly painted and thoughtfully updated throughout. Enjoy a modern kitchen with brand-new appliances, fully upgraded bathrooms, brand-new carpet,  Rarely available, this charming home offers the perfect blend of comfort, convenience, and community. Located just minutes from I-66 and a short drive to I-95, you’ll have quick access to Fair Oaks Mall, Lowe’s, Walmart, and a wide array of dining and shopping options. Whether you're commuting or spending a day out, everything you need is right around the corner. Oxford Row is a hidden gem — the smallest community in the area with its own private pool! Residents also enjoy access to a private gym, tot lot, picnic area, and beautifully maintained green spaces. Don’t miss your chance to call this inviting townhouse your new home. We look forward to welcoming you!

PublicRemarks: Charming 2-Bedroom Colonial Townhouse in Prime Fairfax Location! This beautifully maintained 2-bedroom, 1.5-bath colonial townhouse is nestled in an unbeatable location. Owned and cared for with pride over the past decade, this home is move-in ready and filled with recent upgrades. The first floor features elegant, durable luxury vinyl plank (LVP) flooring, while the kitchen boasts brand-new countertops, freshly painted cabinets, and stainless steel appliances, including an oven, microwave, refrigerator, cooktop, and dishwasher. The entire interior has been freshly painted, and new, soft carpet has been installed in both upstairs bedrooms for added comfort. The hallway bath has been completely refreshed with new hardware, a vanity, light fixture, mirror, and toilet. New windows in the master bedroom provide better insulation and soundproofing. Additionally, the home includes a brand-new LG stackable washer and dryer for convenient in-unit laundry. The location is ideal, with the home situated within walking distance to top-rated Providence Elementary and Katherine Johnson Middle schools. Commuting is a breeze with easy access to I-66, Route 50, and Highway 29. You'll also find yourself just minutes away from Fair Oaks Mall, Fair Lakes Shopping Center, Mosaic District, and more. This home is perfect for anyone seeking a comfortable, updated living space in a highly desirable area. Schedule your private tour today. Do not miss out! OFFER DEADLINE MONDAY at 5:00 pm.
